author: arkurth
msg: Changed file permissions from 0644 to 0755 for the image directory and files stored in the repository.  Image retrieval fails if the remote directory doesn't have execute permissions.  The command to check if the files/directory exists returns 'permission denied'.

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1764 protect against java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError when being used in an app server but as app managed and the JVM exits quickly from under us

msg: While "largely rubbish" was a bit of an overstatement, this is done now.
